movie101_6965768652251628068_1140_1320.text: Xia Luo, who was about to leave, was stopped by Ma Dongmei. Xia Luo looked at Ma Dongmei, then at the crowd, and said, "Mom, I'll burn some extra paper for you later."

movie101_6965768652251628068_2940_3120.text: Da Chun, who was about to leave, was stopped by Ma Dongmei. He turned around and saw Ma Dongmei standing in front of him, holding a sunflower. Da Chun was stunned. Ma Dongmei said, "Don't insult my idol, get lost."

movie101_6965768652251628068_3840_4020.text: Zhang Yang and Xia Luo, with their shirts off, walked towards Yuan Hua, while Qiu Ya, who was about to leave, was stopped by Xia Luo.

Yuan Hua looked at the woman in the pool, Zhang Yang said: "Stop looking." "She is your sister-in-law now."
Qiu Ya smiled at Zhang Yang, then turned to look at Yuan Hua. Yuan Hua, who was eating, turned his head to look at Qiu Ya, and Zhang Yang said: "Why are you still sneaking a peek?"

Yuan Hua said: "Showing off, showing off."
Xia Luo said: "Could you write an impromptu poem about my current outfit?"
Yuan Hua said: "My poetry is always critical."
Xia Luo said: "It's okay."
Yuan Hua said: 'Let me try.' 'Strutting cockerel, Soars higher than the phoenix.'

Xia Luo said: 'Good, good literature! You have not lost your talent from those days. How about this, I'll invest in a magazine for you, I've already thought of a name. 'Men Need to Show off.' You will be the editor.'
Yuan Hua looked at the two of them, and Zhang Yang said: "I'm not a bad person, I'm just a good person who made a mistake."
Xia Luo said: "You're not a good person, you're a bad person." Yuan Hua drank the red wine in one gulp, and the crowd laughed.
Yuan Hua said: "Let me tell you, I really regret it. I was so naive back then. Xia Luo, the truth is that I'm still haunted by the time Chen Kai insulted Winter Mei."
Yuan Hua said: "What did you say?"
Yuan Hua said: "Maybe I talked too much," "I thought you all knew."

Yuan Hua said: "Actually, it's no big deal. Winter Mei agreed to go into the small woods with Chen Kai to protect you. I shouted myself hoarse, but I couldn't change her mind to protect you."

movie101_6965768652251628068_4020_4200.text: Yuan Hua said: "It ended up costing Winter Mei's family a lot of money. I heard her mom even had to sell the house."

Xia Luo: "Do you know about this as well, Zhang Yang?"
Zhang Yang said: "Bro, whether I know or not, I'm uncertain." Zhang Yang looked at Xia Luo with a smile, and Xia Luo, with a face full of disdain, took a sip of wine.
Xia Luo, with a bitter smile, said: "It's all in the past now."
Qiu Ya said: "Come on, let's all have a drink."
Zhang Yang said: "Yes, it's been so long since we've seen our old classmates. Come on, let me pour you a drink."
Xia Luo stood up and said: "To hell with drinking!" Xia Luo stood up and walked away, while Yuan Hua stood up and looked at Qiu Ya, who was standing in front of him, with a face full of confusion.

Xia Luo shouted: "Winter Mei"

movie101_6966492004553490981_2280_2460.text: Coco said: "Is that the reason two industrial countries jointly invaded an agricultural country?"

The other said, "Alright, I begin to understand her thoughts. Sorry. In the end, these things all belong to the bank now. They are of no value to me. If I could, I would give them to you."

movie101_6992521335159292452_3600_3780.text: Xiaoyun Li said: "Uncle, are you questioning me now as a police officer?" "Did you come to find me with the knowledge of the station?" "You should be very clear that I'm a minor."

Officer Lei asked, "During the time the incident occurred, did you see anyone drive your daughter home?"

Chen Shui-bian said: "I started from 1996 and continued until now. Huang Yufeng A-Po passed away in February 2003. The Japanese built a bridge from Kamo base to the county town, opening a road to the Japanese military camp in Baoting. They forced the local farmers to work as laborers. Huang Yufeng A-Po was among these laborers in the village because she was very beautiful, as our Li people are. The Japanese drooled when they saw her and tricked her into going to the base to do laundry. During the Cultural Revolution, her name became well-known. Some people used to say she married a Japanese, saying she was a Japanese collaborator. At that time, these elderly women were called Japanese mothers. The term 'comfort women' hadn't been mentioned yet."

Yuan Xiaoou, holding the phone, said, 'Come back quickly and save us. Water is already inside the car. Hurry, hurry, hurry.'
Qi Jia, with a worried expression, said, 'Yuan Xiaoou, we probably won't be able to escape, right?'
Yuan Xiaoou looked at Qi Jia and said: "It's okay, it's okay, I’m still here. Don't worry."
Qi Jia said: "Yuan Xiaoou, we are about to die, right?"
Qi Jia looked at Yuan Xiaoou with a face full of worry, and Yuan Xiaoou said: "If we have to die together, I think it's quite nice."
Qi Jia said: "Yuan Xiaoou, I've imagined ten thousand ways to die, but I never thought it would be like this, suffocating."

movie101_7101937153785102885_420_600.text: Doctor said: "The age of menopausal patients is tending to decrease." "This is called premature menopause." "I'll prescribe you a 'Dingkun Dan.'" "Back in the day, Emperor Qianlong had three thousand concubines." "It's thanks to this that they could regulate the liver, relieve depression, and maintain youth."

Qi Jia said: "You misdiagnosed." "Yeah, I'm not dizzy, you know, my head is perfectly fine; I'm not dizzy." "I'm not even married yet, and I haven't even had a child." "My mom hasn't even hit menopause." "Are you saying I'm experiencing premature menopause?" "Do you even have professional ethics?"
Doctor said: "Angry, aren't we? Feeling a bit dizzy, right? These are typical symptoms of menopause. Just like this cactus. Prickly on the outside, but the inside is still very soft."
Qi Jia said: "Soft my sister, prick your own head." The scene shifted to the garden, where Qi Jia lay on the lawn, and Lin Shuer stood behind her with arms crossed.

Lin Shuer: "Heard you hit menopause?" "I told you before, if you don't get your period for six months, it's a bad omen." "But when you seek medical advice, why would you prick the doctor's chin with a cactus?" "Why did you leave my phone number after you pricked them?" "Is that decent of you?" "Ah, let's go."
Lin Shuer asked: "Tell me, what do you want to do tonight?"
Qi Jia said: "The night grows late with snow threatening; may I have a drink?"
Lin Shuer said: "No, I already told you I'm allergic to alcohol."

Qi Jia said: "Every year at this time, those who are graduating turn the quiet summer night into a wild and sentimental one. Three bottles of drink in my belly, all my sentimentality turns into a stomachache. Unhappy things seem to become happy."
Qi Jia said: "This wedding dress cost me five hundred yuan to rent."
Lin Shuer said: "Look at this lack of spirit."
Qi Jia said: "Can't get it dirty."
Qi Jia sat on the steps, looking at the sky, and said: "I have a stomachache."
Qi Jia asked: "Stomachache?"
Qi Jia said: "Shouldn't my heart be aching instead?"
Lin Shuer said: "You deserve it." The two sat on the steps, looking dejected. Lin Shuer put her arm around Qi Jia's shoulder, and Qi Jia leaned her head on her shoulder, crying.
Qi Jia said: "That bastard Liu Chong."
Lin Shuer said: "Chong your ass, he flew away this afternoon."
Qi Jia said: "When he left, he asked me to take good care of his turtle."
Lin Shuer said: "What turtle?" "If I were you." "I'd take the opportunity to blind him." "Pierce his mouth." "You're such a wimp."

The scene shifts to the campus, where a group of students are sitting in a circle, drawing with chalk on the ground. They are drawing a large character for 'love' in the center, surrounded by the words 'forever and ever'.
The scene shifts to the campus, where Lin Shuer is holding a girl in a wedding dress, saying, "Don't leave, don't you leave. Who the hell will pick up the soap for me if you go?"
Qi Jia and Nurse were walking on the street, Qi Jia said: "I'm graduating!"
Qi Jia and Lin Shuer ran after them, Qi Jia said: "Congratulations on finding your group, you crazy person."

movie101_7101937153785102885_4380_4560.text: Qi Jia said: "If we are about to die later on, can you get away from me? I don't want others to find us and say we died together due to a flood."

Qi Jia, who was already in the water, was also swept away by the torrent. Yuan Xiaoou, who was holding Qi Jia, was also swept away by the torrent. The two were swept away by the torrent, and the car was also swept away by the torrent.

movie101_7101937153785102885_4560_4740.text: The scene shifts to the alley, where Yuan Xiaoou is seen walking out of the house, closing the door behind him.

The scene shifts to the hospital room, where Qi Jia sits on the bed, looking at the empty room. The room is furnished with a small table, a chair, and a bed. The walls are decorated with a few paintings, and there's a vase with a rose on the table. Qi Jia sits on the bed, looking around the room, then looks at the ceiling, and finally, at the window.
Qi Jia, who was tidying up, heard the sound of the door closing. She turned around and saw a piece of paper on the floor. She bent down to pick it up.
Qi Jia looked at the envelope, then opened it, and inside was a stack of bills.
Qi Jia's phone rang, and she answered it. The caller ID showed 'Yuan Xiaoou'.

Yuan Xiaoou said: "Qi Jia, I don't like saying goodbye face to face. Let's say goodbye in this way. First and foremost, you must take your medicine on time, two bowls with half a pot of water, drink it after breakfast and dinner, the one at night doesn't need to be reheated, just warm it in hot water. Don't panic when you forget your keys, I've hidden a spare one in the electricity meter box at the door, you'll touch it as you reach out. You can't give up on exercise halfway, you must add ten sit-ups every week, and running must be an hour after dinner. When running, don't think about anything, just run."
Qi Jia walked into the kitchen, opened the cabinet, and saw a row of kitchen knives.

Yuan Xiaoou said, 'Qi Jia, don't cry for the people who don't deserve it. Be the real you. You are kind, but good people should treat themselves better. When you're tired, sleep; when you wake up, smile. Simple life is the best. Thank you. Qi Jia, I'm leaving.'
Yuan Xiaoou, who was tidying up the room, heard the sound of the door closing and turned to look at the door. Qi Jia, who had just entered, was standing at the door, looking at him.

Qi Jia, who was tidying up the house, was startled by the scene in front of her. She looked at the cactus in her hand, and the blood on her fingertip was still fresh. She looked at the cactus in her hand, and the blood on her fingertip was still fresh.
Qi Jia, holding the cactus, smiled at the cactus, then turned and walked out of the room.

movie101_7101937153785102885_4740_4920.text: Qi Jia walked out of the company, and a truck drove by. The driver shouted, 'Don't you value your life?!'

The exhibition hall was filled with people, and the walls were plastered with posters of the Little Yellow River. The posters were filled with the words 'Little Yellow River' and 'Little Yellow River Art Exhibition'. The exhibition hall was spacious, with a high ceiling and bright lighting. The posters were vivid and eye-catching, and the exhibition was well-organized.
Qi Jia looked at the painting, which was a picture of a tree, and then turned to look at the other paintings on the wall.
Qi Jia looked at the painting, which was a portrait of her and Yuan Xiaoou. The painting was signed by Yuan Xiaoou.

Qi Jia looked at the painting and said: "I want to see the painting." The painting showed a man and a woman kissing under a tree. The man was wearing a suit, and the woman was wearing a dress. The painting was very beautiful.
Qi Jia looked at the paintings on the wall, and the paintings were all about her and Yuan Xiaoou.
Qi Jia looked at the painting and said: "I want to be like this painting."
Yuan Xiaoou said: "Don't worry, as long as I'm here, I'll definitely protect both of you."
Qi Jia, who was about to leave, was pulled back by Yuan Xiaoou. Yuan Xiaoou said: "Don't worry, I'll definitely cure you."

The scene shifts to 2014, the year Qi Jia and Yuan Xiaoou met, and the year Qi Jia became a designer.
The elevator doors slowly opened, and the man in the suit stepped out. He looked around and then walked towards the reception desk.

The scene shifts to the interior of an office, where Yuan Xiaoou is walking and talking on the phone. He is dressed in a suit and tie, with a briefcase in hand. He walks through the office, greeting colleagues as he goes.
Yuan Xiaoou said: "Oh man, these two foreigners can really drink, they nearly drank me to death last night, but yes."

movie101_7101937153785102885_4920_5100.text: Yuan Xiaoou was at a company event, looking at his phone, when suddenly the phone rang. He answered the call and said, 'Hey, rich lady, what made you think of calling me?'
Lin Shuer said: "Yo, I was even worried that you were too busy with state affairs to take my call."
Yuan Xiaoou said: "What am I busy with? It’s not that I don’t contact you all because I’m afraid you wouldn’t want to deal with me."
Lin Shuer said: 'I knew you’d try to turn it around. You’re really shining in Shanghai, aren’t you?'
Yuan Xiaoou said: "Don’t say that... Whenever you want to come to Shanghai, I'm always ready to welcome you."
Lin Shuer said: "Look at you, sweet talker. When Qi Jia went to Shanghai, I didn’t see you being so attentive."
Yuan Xiaoou asked: "When did she come to Shanghai?"
Lin Shuer: "She's been there for a while now, currently in the hospital."
Yuan Xiaoou asked, "Why is she still in the hospital?"
Lin Shuer said: "Qi Jia has been in Shanghai for almost a year now."
Yuan Xiaoou asked: "No, which hospital is she in?"

Lin Shuer said: 'What, you want to visit her? I’m telling you, you’re too late. Even if you saw her, you wouldn’t recognize her. Do you know why you can’t catch up with Qi Jia, blockhead? It’s not because you’re poor, dumb, and ugly; it’s simple, because you lack the savvy.'
Yuan Xiaoou said: "Stop the bullshit and just tell me which hospital and what ward she's in."
Yuan Xiaoou drove to the entrance of the hospital, parked the car, and ran into the hospital.
Yuan Xiaoou ran into the hospital lobby, looking around for Lin Shuer. He ran to the reception desk and asked the nurse, "Have you seen this girl?"
Yuan Xiaoou ran through the lobby, looking around for Lin Shuer, but couldn't find her. He ran up the stairs, looking around the second floor, but still couldn't find Lin Shuer.
The scene shifts to the hospital lobby, where Yuan Xiaoou is pacing back and forth, looking around. He then sees Lin Shuer coming out of the emergency room, and they embrace each other.
Yuan Xiaoou, who was sitting in the hospital lobby, saw Lin Shuer and immediately stood up to greet her.
Yuan Xiaoou looked at Lin Shuer, then at the phone, and finally sat down. He said, 'Qi Jia.'
Yuan Xiaoou took the cigarette, and Lin Shuer took the lighter. Yuan Xiaoou said, "You've been in Shanghai for such a long time, why didn't you contact me?"
Lin Shuer asked: "Who are you?"
Yuan Xiaoou said: "I'm Yuan Xiaoou" "Little turtle" "I'm sorry"
Yuan Xiaoou said, 'How did you become like this? It’s all my fault. Even when you rejected me back then...'

movie101_7101937153785102885_5100_5280.text: Yuan Xiaoou said: "Reject me" "If I don't leave" "I can take care of you forever" "You wouldn't have ended up like this"
Qi Jia said: "What did you say? I don't understand."
Yuan Xiaoou said: "I said I want to be with you forever. We will never part."
Qi Jia said: "Well if you want to be with her, I am going back to Xiamen"
Yuan Xiaoou turned to look at the girl and asked, "Who is she?"
Qi Jia said: "She is my cousin" "She has been sick recently so I came to Shanghai to see her"
Yuan Xiaoou looked at Qi Jia, then turned around and said: "You've been in Shanghai for so long, why didn't you find me?"
Qi Jia said: "Why should I find you""You are a promising young man, I am an old woman""So I have to see if you already have a harem"

Yuan Xiaoou held Qi Jia in his arms, and they kissed passionately. The kiss was deep and intense, and the two of them were immersed in the moment. After a while, they separated, and Qi Jia looked at Yuan Xiaoou with a smile.
Yuan Xiaoou said: "Qi Jia". Yuan Xiaoou looked at Qi Jia with a smile, and Qi Jia shyly lowered her head. Yuan Xiaoou took out a ring from his pocket and put it on Qi Jia's hand.
Yuan Xiaoou said: "I've been carrying it, and I always thought,""I will meet you someday"
Qi Jia said: "I shouldn't have let you go". After saying that, Qi Jia turned around and left, leaving Yuan Xiaoou kneeling on the ground, holding the ring.
Yuan Xiaoou said: "Can you give me a chance? I want to take care of you forever."
Qi Jia turned around, looking at the ring on Yuan Xiaoou's hand, and said: "Okay."
Yuan Xiaoou took the ring and put it on Qi Jia's ring finger.

Qi Jia, with tears in her eyes, hugged Yuan Xiaoou tightly, and Yuan Xiaoou also held her tightly. They held each other tightly, and Yuan Xiaoou's tears flowed uncontrollably. The screen gradually fades to black, and the movie title appears: 'A Kwak Jae Yong Film'.
Qi Jia said: "I Qi Jia am willing to marry you Liu Chong. Whether in health or even better health, in my lifetime I will love you, be loyal to you, cherish you, until death do us part."
Liu Chong said: "I'm not ready yet."

movie101_7101937153785102885_600_780.text: Qi Jia said: "That's quite a lot."
Qi Jia said: "We're all in the same boat, I should help them out."
Lin Shuer said: "Don't go, come back."
Lin Shuer said: "Go back to the dormitory, there's stomach medicine there, hurry."
Qi Jia, who was holding Lin Shuer's hand, was suddenly pulled into a hug by Lin Shuer. Qi Jia said: "Oh my, Lin Shuer"
Lin Shuer said: "Stop messing around."
Lin Shuer said, "We're here, we're here."
Lin Shuer and Qi Jia were banging on the door, and Lin Shuer said, 'Why can't this door be opened?'
Qi Jia said: "Isn't our dorm empty?" "Hey, hey, hey, open up, open up, it's a raid!"
Qi Jia said: "Open up, open up"
Qi Jia and Lin Shuer opened the door and walked in, Qi Jia said: "Take off your clothes."
Lin Shuer asked: "Look, look, who is it?"
Lin Shuer said: "Yuan Xiaoou". Yuan Xiaoou was startled, and the two of them looked at each other in surprise.

Qi Jia said: "Yuan Xiaoou". Yuan Xiaoou, who was bare-chested, was startled by Qi Jia's sudden appearance, and hurriedly ran out of the room. He didn't even have time to put on his pants, and ran out barefoot. The girls laughed at him as he ran out, and Yuan Xiaoou ran down the stairs barefoot, with a pair of shoes left behind.
Qi Jia and Lin Shuer ran into the room and saw Lao Bai sleeping in Qi Jia's bed. Qi Jia asked, 'Lao Bai, why are you sleeping in my bed?'
Lao Bai said: "All my luggage is on the bed. Unless you want us to sleep on the floor." Lao Bai then turned to Qi Jia and said: "You almost forced him to jump out the window."
Lin Shuer said: "Sigh, Yuan Xiaoou is the most honest guy in our class, and even him? You're such a beast."
Lao Bai said: "Hey, he pushed me down, okay? Yuan Xiaoou burst in, knelt on the floor, and tearfully confessed he's had a crush on me for four years."
Lin Shuer said: "He usually seems so quiet."
Lao Bai said: "Hey, if I didn't show my gratitude for his support in real action, would I still be considered human?"
Qi Jia said: "Well, anyway, you and Yuan Xiaoou go to Suzhou together. I wish you happiness."
Qi Jia said: "My relationship with him is pure."
Qi Jia said: "You sleep on my bed, and now you take my bed sheet too."
Lin Shuer said: "Hey, hey, hey, forget it, they both slept on it. What do you want it for? Just take it."

Lao Bai said: "Goodbye my sisters, bye." Lao Bai turned around and left, leaving the three sisters standing there in a daze. The painting on the wall was of a small town, with houses and streets intertwining, and the colors were very vibrant.
Qi Jia said: "I never would have thought that Yuan Xiaoou neither went to Suzhou with Lao Bai nor returned to his home in the Northeast. Two months later, he appeared at my doorstep."

The scene shifts to the next day, where a cat is sitting on a wall, watching the surroundings. A man is sitting on the ground, eating an ice cream and looking at his phone. A small dog is running around him.
Yuan Xiaoou asked, "Did your wife kick you out too?" The man eating an ice cream, Yuan Xiaoou, was sitting on the ground with his luggage, while the man collecting cardboard was Lao Bai.
The man said, 'Once I get my house back, I'll save the balcony for you. Women are all the same. Men are still better.'

movie101_7101937153785102885_60_240.text: The other person said: "Sit down."
Qi Jia patted the little girl's face and said, 'Okay.' Then she turned around and left, leaving the little girl's family behind.

Qi Jia looked at the mother and daughter, then turned to look at the people around them. The mother and daughter were sitting in the middle of the bus, with the mother's face full of worry. The daughter was looking at Qi Jia with wide eyes, while the people around them were all staring at them.

Qi Jia sat in the bus, looking out the window, her eyes filled with determination. She was on her way to Beijing to find Liu Chong. The bus slowly drove away, and Qi Jia's figure gradually disappeared from sight.
Qi Jia said: "Looking at this extremely familiar place, I realized that I have indeed entered menopause. Because it's in menopause that one loves to chew on the painful black memories of one's life."

The scene shifts to the day of the wedding, with Qi Jia running in a wedding dress, her hair disheveled, and her makeup smudged. She is running on the street, with people on both sides of the road cheering and clapping for her.
Qi Jia, dressed in a wedding gown, ran down the street with a smile on her face.

The scene shifts to the graduation ceremony, where Lin Shuer, dressed in a wedding gown, walks onto the stage with a long veil trailing behind her. She is followed by Liu Chong in a graduation gown. The students below are taking photos of Lin Shuer, and the applause is continuous.

Qi Jia, dressed in a wedding gown, walked onto the stage with a beaming smile, waving to the audience. She then turned to Liu Chong and said, 'Red envelope, Red envelope, I will send you my bank account.'

Qi Jia, dressed in a wedding gown, walked onto the stage with a beaming smile. Lin Shuer, dressed in a graduation gown, followed behind her. Liu Chong, sitting in the front row, saw this and asked, "What are you doing?"

The crowd below the stage was cheering, and the two of them were also immersed in the joy of the moment. Lin Shuer whispered in Liu Chong's ear: "I am willing" "From Beijing to Xiamen" "2000 kilometers" "I give you a promise" "I am willing"
Principal said: "Students, next, please representative of the graduates, classmate Liu Chong, onto the stage for a speech."

Liu Chong, dressed in a graduation gown, walked onto the stage with a smile, while Lin Shuer, dressed in a wedding gown, followed behind. The audience below applauded and cheered, and the two of them waved to the audience.
Liu Chong said: "We are about to say goodbye to the campus" "and head towards all the wide world"
Lin Shuer said: "You have to flick the tassel when you go on stage later" "How can you do that dressed like this?"
Qi Jia said: "I flicked my bangs."
Liu Chong continued: "Our initial dreams," "held tightly in our hands."
The applause was deafening, and the students below the stage were all smiling happily. Liu Chong walked down the stage with a smile, and Lin Shuer followed behind him, looking at him with a smile.
The crowd below the stage was cheering, "Marry, marry, marry."

Principal said: "Quiet down please" "I have been a wedding witness several times" "But I have never done it at a graduation ceremony" "So" "Can the female student in the white dress please come up on stage?"

Qi Jia, dressed in a wedding gown, walked onto the stage with a smile, holding Liu Chong's hand. The audience below applauded and cheered. Qi Jia and Liu Chong walked to the podium, and Principal stood below, waiting for them.

movie101_7101937153785102885_780_960.text: The man eating the corn said: "Don't grab my bag, I've told you."
Yuan Xiaoou said: "I have to go home."
Qi Jia said: "If you continue like this, I will call the police."
Yuan Xiaoou, holding a bun, ran over and said: "What are you doing?" "Stop it, what are you doing?" "Don't make trouble."
Yuan Xiaoou, holding a popsicle, said: "So you want to play nasty games with me?"
Yuan Xiaoou, holding a glass of water, pointed at Vagrant and said: "This is my home, give me the keys."
Qi Jia said: "How many times have I told you, that's not your home."
Yuan Xiaoou said: "People say it's not your home."
Qi Jia said: 'If you continue like this, I will call the police.'
Yuan Xiaoou said: "It's just a key, come on, take it." Vagrant took the key and looked at it.
Vagrant said: "I said you two must be having an affair."
Yuan Xiaoou said: "Girl, his words..." Yuan Xiaoou was about to explain when Vagrant suddenly appeared, and Yuan Xiaoou quickly stopped him.
Qi Jia said: "I'm not going."

Yuan Xiaoou said: "Senior brother, you got the wrong person." Yuan Xiaoou, who was drinking milk tea, was startled by the sudden appearance of Qi Jia. Qi Jia, who was about to leave, was pulled back by Yuan Xiaoou. Lin Shuer was sitting on the sofa, watching the scene.
Lin Shuer walked in and said: "Yuan Xiaou, how did you bring him here?"
Qi Jia said: "I ran into that vagabond again, and Yuan Xiaou saved me."
Lin Shuer said: "I knew this rent couldn't be so cheap for no reason. But how did you end up here? At this moment in time, shouldn't you be watching the sunset with Old Bai in Suzhou?"
Yuan Xiaoou said: "I am not going to Suzhou."
Lin Shuer said: "Ah, you're not going to Suzhou, what about your job?"
Yuan Xiaoou said: "I'll find another one."
Qi Jia said: "Lin Shuer, come over here. Let him squeeze in with us. He's our classmate."
Lin Shuer said: "Squeeze in, get pregnant, is it yours or mine, did you forget his thing with Old Bai, he's very thirsty, this is like leading the wolf into the room."
Qi Jia said: "But that vagabond is afraid of him."
Lin Shuer said: "Just him, that small size."
Qi Jia said: "It's better to have than not, at least he can take a knife."
Lin Shuer said: "Alright. But he can't stay for long."
Qi Jia said: "Yuan Xiaou, don't go, live here."

Zhu Er said: "If you continue to talk, I will kill you."

Da Zang asked, "Do you want to compete in martial arts with me?"

Mo Han looked at Yu Xuan with a smile, then turned and said, 'Then I'm leaving. Take care.'
Yu Xuan, who was about to leave, heard Mo Han's voice and turned back. She saw Mo Han standing by the window, looking out. Yu Xuan quickly walked over and said, 'Zi Chen.'
Mo Han's eyes were filled with reluctance, but he still turned his head away. Lin Lin, with tears in her eyes, watched Mo Han's retreating figure, her heart aching.
Lin Lin asked, "Does it hurt?"
Lin Lin wiped Mo Han's forehead with a towel, and Mo Han closed his eyes in pain. Lin Lin said, 'Mo Han, for me, you almost lost your life.'
Mo Han said: 'This is not...'

movie101_7176565114756137528_1680_1860.text: Mo Han said: 'I'm not dead yet, don't be sad. Even if I die, it's deserved.'
Lin Lin, with a sobbing voice, said, 'I can never repay you for your kindness in this lifetime.'
Mo Han said: "Don't mention that. Do you remember 'The Peony Pavilion'? The living can die, the dead can live. Maybe everything is destined."
Lin Lin, with tears in her eyes, wiped them away and continued to feed Mo Han. At this moment, Lu Xiao walked in. Seeing this, Lu Xiao said, 'Lin Lin, let me do it.'
Lu Xiao said: "Secretary Yang, the commander-in-chief is here to see you."
Lu Xiao said, 'Lin Lin, let me do it. Look how tired you've become these past few days.'
Lin Lin said: "I want to give everything to the person who has given their life for me."
Lu Xiao said: "That's too complicated for me to understand. All I know is, as a man, I can't always let a girl accompany me.""Isn't that right, Secretary Yang?"
Lin Lin said: "What nonsense are you talking about? Who let you in?"
Lin Lin said: "I will move him to my room tomorrow and accompany him every day."
Lu Xiao said: "Lin Lin, don't joke around."
Lin Lin said: "I mean what I say."
Che Zhen Shan said: "Lu Xiao, you should go and take care of that matter. Hurry up."
Che Zhen Shan, seeing the situation, quickly stepped forward to explain: 'Secretary Yang, that's just the way Lu Xiao is. Don't take it to heart.'
Lu Xiao said: "Lin Lin, let me do it."
Lin Lin said, 'No need.' Lin Lin put down the bowl and walked to the door.
Che Zhen Shan asked: "Secretary Yang, are you feeling better?"
Mo Han said: "Commander, I'm sorry for causing you trouble."
Che Zhen Shan said: "Don't think too much, just focus on healing."
Lu Xiao, who was sitting by the bed, was startled by the sudden commotion and said, 'What? The bandit escaped?'
Lu Xiao said: "The checkpoint at Dongda bridge says," "They escaped by boat last night.""They even kidnapped a hostage as a cover."
Che Zhen Shan said: "Such elusive behavior, it's not a common bandit. Could it be the Communist Party?"

Che Zhen Shan said: "But why would the Communist Party kidnap my daughter?"Not killing her or doing anything cruel and unusual,""just for a hundred taels of gold? Is that possible?""If they're not after gold, then what are they after?"
Lu Xiao said: "They also kidnapped a businessman's daughter not too long ago."
Che Zhen Shan said: "Oh, it seems like they are really bandits after all."

movie101_7176565114756137528_1860_2040.text: Lin Lin walked into the room, glanced at the sleeping Mo Han, and then sat at the desk to open the package.
Mo Han said: "This music is so nice. Lin Lin, I think I should go back. Living here is not very convenient. You need to work and take care of me."

Lin Lin said: "Don't get your wires crossed. I'll be fine right away." Lin Lin hung up the phone, and Mo Han, who was sleeping, was awakened by the ringing. He got up and looked at the clock, it was already 2 AM.
Mo Han said, 'Lin Lin, I need to go to the bathroom. Can you help me up?'
Lin Lin said, 'Okay.' Then she put the money on the table, tidied up the bed, and covered Mo Han with a blanket.
Lin Lin sat down beside Mo Han, and Mo Han looked at her with a smile. Lin Lin looked at Mo Han, then at the table, and then at the window. Mo Han also looked at the window.
Mo Han, who was sitting on the bed, suddenly felt a sharp pain in his chest. He quickly stood up, clutching his chest, and staggered towards the desk.
Lin Lin said: "Be careful, you go back to bed, I'll call the guard to bring the urinal in."
Mo Han said: "Ah, no need, I just didn't walk too well. It's okay now."

Lin Lin and Mo Han were holding each other, walking towards the door. Lin Lin suddenly stopped, turned around, and looked at Mo Han. Mo Han also looked at her, and they stared at each other for a long time.
Lin Lin said, 'It's here.'
The scene shifts to the office, where a female soldier says, 'Miss Lin Lin, I brought some porridge for Secretary Yang.'
Lin Lin opened the door and said, 'I'll take care of it.'
Soldier said: "Oh, let me, let me, it's hot, I'll do it."
Lin Lin ran over and said, 'Hey, don't put it there. How could you be so clumsy? Get out quickly.'
Mo Han said: "Yes, yes."

Lin Lin, who was tidying up the room, suddenly heard the sound of a door opening. She quickly hid the letter in her skirt and ran to the door. Mo Han, who had just entered, was startled by Lin Lin's sudden appearance.
Soldier, who was guarding outside, saw Lu Xiao coming and immediately stood up to salute him.
Lu Xiao hung up the phone and asked, "Where did he say he was going?"
Mo Han said: "Said he was going to buy a gift for Miss Lin Lin."
Lu Xiao hung up the phone, his face full of worry. He then picked up the phone again and said, "Follow that man with the surname Yang immediately."
Mo Han said: "Do you remember the book I asked you to buy last time?" "Yes, I'm fine now." "Room 305 at the Fokai Hotel, tonight at seven." "Don't worry, I'll be on time."

Soldier, who was on the phone, was startled by the sound of the door closing. He looked out the window and saw Mo Han carrying a child, walking away. Soldier immediately put down the phone and ran out of the house.

movie101_7176565114756137528_2040_2220.text: Lu Xiao, who was originally walking on the street, suddenly stopped. He looked around, then turned and walked back the way he came. The sun was setting, and the sky was filled with clouds. The sun was half obscured by the clouds, casting a beautiful light on the ground.
Mo Han said, 'Thank you for taking care of me these days.'
Lin Lin said: "The sun sets, but it will rise as usual tomorrow, you say. Once this pendant shatters, will it ever be the same?"
Mo Han said, 'Why does it have to shatter?'
Lin Lin said: "In times of chaos, who can guarantee that a tiny pendant won't be destroyed?"
Mo Han said: "Then it should be well protected."
Lin Lin said, "Could you help me put it on?" Mo Han smiled and put the necklace on Lin Lin. Lin Lin touched the necklace and looked at Mo Han with a smile.
Lin Lin said: "For a long time, I felt like the most unfortunate person in the world, always unable to move on from the past, afraid to love again for fear of falling back into a life's abyss."
Mo Han said: "Let the past be the past."
Mo Han said: "You only live once, cherish it."
Lin Lin said, 'Thank you for giving me the courage to love again, thank you.'
Lin Lin said: "You gave me a gift, can I take you out for a meal?"
Mo Han said: "Today, huh"
Lin Lin said: "Yes, let's go to the Four Joys Restaurant now, to make up for my past mistakes."
Mo Han said: "I can't today, I have an appointment. Let's change it to another day. I'll invite you."
Lin Lin said: "Hmm, who's more important than me?"
Mo Han said: "An old friend, we've grown up together."
Lin Lin asked: "Is it your childhood sweetheart?"
Mo Han asked, "What are you thinking?"
Lin Lin laughed and ran away, Mo Han sat there alone, watching Lin Lin's retreating figure, feeling a bit lost.

Mo Han walked out of the dormitory, and the night was exceptionally quiet. He walked towards the dormitory, but suddenly, a figure flashed past him. He turned around and saw a man in a military uniform, who was Lu Xiao.

Mo Han, who was originally walking leisurely, suddenly quickened his pace. Lu Xiao, who was following him, also quickened his pace. The two of them ran through the alley, and Mo Han, who was leading, suddenly stopped.

Lu Xiao, who was originally standing in the courtyard, suddenly turned his head and looked in the direction of the sound. He saw a figure in the distance, walking alone on the road. Lu Xiao's eyes were filled with worry, and he looked at the figure with a worried expression.
The Japanese soldiers were still searching for him, and Mo Han was pinned down by the Japanese soldiers, unable to move.

Mo Han, with a face full of sweat, looked at Lin Lin with a smile, then turned and walked away. He sat down on the bench, his eyes filled with determination. He looked up at the sky, then at the ground, and finally at the distant horizon.

movie101_7176565114756137528_2220_2400.text: Lu Xiao, who was lying on the ground, was pulled up by Mo Han. Mo Han said, "I'm not a traitor." Lu Xiao, who was about to shoot, was stopped by Mo Han.
Mo Han said: "Why is it you, Lu Xiao"
Lu Xiao asked, "Secretary Yang, where are you going in such a hurry?"
Mo Han smiled and said, "I'm just strolling around."
Lu Xiao said: "Do you think I don't know you're heading to room 305 at Fuhkai Hotel?"
Mo Han looked at Lu Xiao with a smile and said, "Lu Xiao, you seem well informed."
Lu Xiao said: "Speak up, who are you meeting?"
Mo Han said: "Do I need to tell you?"
Lu Xiao pointed the gun at Mo Han and said, "Don't play dumb with me. Are you meeting with the Japanese or the Communists? Speak up."
Mo Han said: "Lu Xiao, I tell you, I am Yang Mohan who serves the Nanjing Government."
Lu Xiao said: "A servant of Nanjing Government? Keep dreaming that in your next life. You don’t need to tell me. We'll go back to the regiment and see."
Mo Han smiled and said, "Lu Xiao, why bother? I can tell you, but you can't let Miss Che know."
Lu Xiao asked: "What, Miss Che?"
Mo Han said: "Actually, I'm going to meet my fiancee."
Lu Xiao said, "Darn, why didn't you say that earlier? Having a fiancee is a great thing, a great thing indeed. Go ahead, go ahead!"
Mo Han said, "Then I'm leaving."
Lu Xiao said, "Go ahead, go ahead." Mo Han turned and left, and Lu Xiao watched him leave with a smile.
Mo Han, who was originally walking towards the door, suddenly stopped, turned around, and knocked on the door, saying, "Room service number 21 is here to deliver your newspaper."
Yu Xuan said, "Come in."
Mo Han pushed open the door and walked in. Yu Xuan turned her head to look at him, her eyes filled with confusion.
Mo Han said: "Yu Xuan"
Mo Han, who had been waiting for a long time, was overjoyed. He hugged Yu Xuan tightly, and Mo Han said, "How could it be you, Yu Xuan?"
Yu Xuan said, "Comrade Hong Zichen, I am here to talk to you on behalf of the organization. Comrade Lao Xu has sacrificed, and the organization has transferred me to replace him."

Yu Xuan said: "I will be your superior line, do not come to find me unless in special circumstances," "Your subordinate line remains the same, the owner of Mobaizhai, 4321. Maintain phone contact and do not meet easily unless necessary"
Mo Han said: "Yes, I have the password, what is my next task?"
Yu Xuan said, 'Unfortunately, that password is a fake.'
Mo Han said: "Fake? How is that possible? I saw with my own eyes that they were using the story of West Chamber."
Yu Xuan said, 'The moment 4321 relayed to you the password he received, we tried to decode it.'

movie101_7176565114756137528_2400_2580.text: Yu Xuan said: "I sent messages, but realized the translations were incorrect, so you must go back immediately and find the correct password."
Mo Han said: "Good."
Yu Xuan looked at Mo Han with a face full of worry and asked, "Are your injuries completely healed?"
Mo Han said: "I'm fine now."
Yu Xuan said: "You need to take good care of yourself."
Mo Han said: "So did I. I thought I would never see you again in this lifetime."
Yu Xuan said: "I forbid you to talk like that."
Mo Han turned around and said, "From the day I went north, I never expected to return alive."
Mo Han said, "You know the risky nature of our undercover work; one day you're alive and kicking, and the next you could be a charred corpse."
Mo Han, with a face full of grievance, turned around and walked towards Yu Xuan. Yu Xuan, with a face full of grievance, turned around and looked at Mo Han.
Mo Han said, "I never thought I'd have the chance to give this to you." Mo Han took out a jade pendant from his pocket and placed it around Yu Xuan's neck.
Mo Han said: "Yu Xuan, thought of so much to say but suddenly found herself at a loss for words."
Yu Xuan asked: "Do you feel the burden is too much to bear alone?"
Mo Han said: "Rest assured, I will definitely complete the mission the organization has entrusted to me."
Yu Xuan said: "You must return safely, promise me that."
Mo Han said, "It's getting late, I should go back now. Take care!"
Yu Xuan said, "Wait." Yu Xuan turned around and saw Mo Han's back, and she slowly walked to his side. She gently touched his ear and said, "Take care."
Yu Xuan, with a face full of grievance, turned to look at Che Linlin, who was also somewhat upset.

Mo Han, who was originally walking towards the door, suddenly stopped. He turned around and saw Che Linlin standing in front of him. He looked at Che Linlin, then at the door, and then at Che Linlin again.
Mo Han looked at Che Linlin in confusion and asked, "Linlin, what are you doing here?"
Che Linlin asked, "Where is your fiancée? I want to meet her."

Che Linlin said: "Yang Mohan, don't play dumb with me. I always thought you were different from other men, a man of your word who doesn't lie."

movie101_7176565114756137528_240_420.text: Che Linlin said: "Strange, then where have I seen you before?"
Yang Muchen said, 'Could it be in a dream?'
Che Linlin said: "In a dream."
Yang Muchen asked, 'Have you ever read Tang Xianzu's 'The Peony Pavilion', Miss Che Linlin?'
Che Linlin said: "Mr. Yang Muchen is familiar with it?"
Yang Muchen said: 'A bit.' 'Love arises without a reason, it deepens once it starts. The living can die, the dead can live, feelings in dreams do not have to be unreal.'
Che Linlin said: 'Mr. Yang Muchen knows a lot about 'The Peony Pavilion.'
Che Zhenshan said: "Mr. Yang Muchen is a top student from Huangpu Academy, isn't he?"
Yang Muchen said: "You're too kind, Colonel. I just enjoyed listening to operas since childhood. After graduating from Huangpu, I went to Japan."
Che Linlin asked: "Mr. Yang Muchen, you have been to Japan?"
Yang Muchen said: "Yes, I studied in Japan. Have you been there too, Miss Che Linlin?"
Che Linlin asked: "What do you think of Japan, Mr. Yang Muchen?"

Yang Muchen said: 'Japan, it's hard to explain in a few words... The Mukden Incident, the fall of the Three Northeastern Provinces, their crimes are unforgivable. However, not every Japanese person is bad, and....' Recently, our leaders are not fully committed to resisting Japan. They believe in 'pacifying internal turmoil before dealing with external aggression.' Surely you have heard of this, Colonel.'
Yang Muchen said: "So from this perspective, whether Japan is good or bad has nothing to do with us. Our greatest enemy at present is the Communist Party."

Yang Muchen smiled and said, 'Come, Miss Che Linlin, let's drink to that.' Yang Muchen picked up the wine glass and clinked it with Che Linlin's glass. Che Zhenshan watched them with a cold expression, while Che Linlin looked at Yang Muchen with a smile.
Che Zhenshan said, 'Mr. Yang Muchen knows nothing at all. They say ignorance is no sin.'
Che Linlin said: "Whether he knows or not doesn't matter. What matters is that he's a heartless Japanese lackey."

Che Zhenshan said: 'He is just conveying the will of his superiors.' 'A person cannot always control their life in this world, can't your father be the same way?' 'Che Linlin, I think that Mr. Yang Muchen is a very talented man.' 'And a favorite of Director Bai, his future is limitless.'
Che Linlin said, 'What does that have to do with me?'
Che Zhenshan said, 'Che Linlin, you're not young anymore. You can't live in the past forever. You need to think about yourself. After all, we still have to live, don't we?'
Che Linlin said: "My affairs are none of your business."
Che Zhenshan said, 'Why are you so stubborn?' 'I'm just looking out for you.'
Che Linlin said: "If you truly care for me, you would immediately drive that Mr. Yang away for me."
Che Zhenshan said: 'He is sent by Nanjing, how dare I drive him away?'
Che Linlin said: "That..."

movie101_7176565114756137528_2580_2760.text: Lin Lin said: "But I was wrong" "Why did you hide that you have a fiancée" "Why didn't you tell me earlier" "You can say directly if you don't like me" "I didn't force you" "You shouldn't lie to me"
Lin Lin, with a sobbing voice, said: "I don't need your gratitude"

Mo Han chased after Lin Lin, shouting, 'Lin Lin, Lin Lin.'
Lin Lin struggled and said: "Let me go, let me go"
Lin Lin said: "Why are you doing this" "Why are you doing this"

Mo Han said: "Follow me, trust me"

Lin Lin and Mo Han entered the room, Lin Lin looked around and asked: "Where is the person"

Lin Lin asked: "Then why did you lie to Lu Xiao"

Mo Han said: "I know he likes you" "So I dare not offend him" "You also know that the Nanjing government just issued last month" "Temporary Regulations on the Prohibition of Smoking and Drugs" "If Lu Xiao knows that I sell tobacco" "I"
Mo Han looked at Lin Lin with a face full of grievance, and said: "I am telling the truth"
Mo Han asked: "What's wrong"
Lin Lin said: "Nothing, let's go."
Mo Han watched Lin Lin leave, then turned to look at the door, his eyes filled with worry. He stood there for a long time, his mind racing with thoughts.
Lu Xiao said: "Commander, that kid surnamed Yang is too out of line, he has a woman at home and still wants to take advantage of Lin Lin, what the hell is this."
Lu Xiao asked: "How do you know" "Have you been to his house"

movie101_7176565114756137528_2760_2940.text: Group leader said: "Still the woman who has seen him."
Lu Xiao said: "No, that Yang kid told me himself."
Group leader said: "Since you haven’t seen it with your own eyes, is there any conclusive evidence? Merely on Mo Han's word, you're so readily convinced. Isn’t that a bit improper?"
Lu Xiao said: "Group leader, why do you always side with him?"

Group leader said: "Whether I am siding with him or doing this for Lin Lin, you should be clear in your heart. Ever since Mo Han arrived, look how happy Lin Lin has been. It’s as if we’re back to our childhood days. That’s more important than anything."
Lu Xiao said: "Ever since that Yang guy came, I haven’t had a single good day."
Group leader said: "Lu Xiao, a soldier should be competing on the battlefield, not competing in jealousy. Look at yourself."

The scene shifts to the evening, Mo Han sits on the sofa, his eyes vacant, staring at the table in front of him. He picks up a bottle of liquor from the table, pours himself a drink, and then puts the bottle back on the table.
Mo Han said: "What’s wrong with you, not a word for so long? You must be bothered by something, you. You are always so suspicious, always overthinking."
Mo Han sat on the sofa, drinking water and looking at Lin Lin, then suddenly sat up and said: "I'm going to the front line."
Mo Han said: "Lin Lin, life is short. Who doesn’t want to fall in love passionately, who doesn’t want to spend a lifetime with the one they love?"

Mo Han said: "But we happen to live in such times, having today doesn’t guarantee tomorrow. We can hardly ensure our own lives, who would dare to touch love so lightly? Maybe right now, outside the window, someone is aiming a gun at me."
Lu Xiao walked over and said: "See, what did I say, confess in front of Lin Lin. Did you go on a date with your fiancée that day or not? Speak."
Mo Han said: "What if I tell you no, would you believe me?" Mo Han said, then turned to look at the female soldiers.

Lu Xiao said: "You’ve got quite a stiff mouth, huh? If not the fiancée, then who are you sneaking around meeting with? The Communist Party? Do you dare admit it? If you dare, I’ve got the guts to put a bullet in you, right here."
Mo Han said: "Lu Xiao, why should I admit anything to you, what are you to decide?"
The soldiers immediately surrounded Lin Lin, and Group leader said: "Brothers, beat him to death for me."
Mo Han was shot in the stomach, and Lin Lin, seeing this, shouted, 'Get out.'

movie101_7176565114756137528_2940_3120.text: Lu Xiao, with a frown, said: 'Lin Lin, he is a man engaged to be married, what are you to him anyway?'
Lin Lin said: 'Even if I were a piece of rotten meat, I wouldn't let a fly like you linger on me. Get out.'
Lu Xiao said, 'Fine, Yang. You're lucky this time. We'll see about that. Let's go.'
Lin Lin, with tears streaming down her face, slowly lowered her gun. She collapsed to the ground, her body shaking uncontrollably. The moonlight shone on her face, making her look even more pitiful.

Mo Han, who was sleeping soundly, was awakened by the sound of Lin Lin's voice. He turned his head to look at Lin Lin, who was still sleeping soundly. Mo Han turned over and sat up, looking at Lin Lin, who was still sleeping soundly. He turned off the bedside lamp, sat up, and looked at the sleeping Lin Lin.
Mo Han sat up, looked at Lin Lin, and gently held her hand. He sat up and looked at Lin Lin, then slowly lay back down.
Mo Han, who was sitting on the bed, turned his head to look at Lin Lin, then lowered his head and continued to pack his luggage.
Mo Han, who was sitting on the bed, suddenly stood up, walked to the table, and sat down in front of the mirror.
Mo Han, who was rummaging through the wardrobe, found a stack of playing cards and a deck of cards.
Mo Han, who was squatting on the toilet, heard the noise and quickly hid the money in his pocket. He then took out a book from his pocket and started reading it carefully.

Mo Han sat on the toilet lid, holding a book, and read it carefully. The book was about the history of the Anti-Japanese War. Mo Han was very interested in the Anti-Japanese War, and he read the book with great interest.
Lin Lin was still sleeping soundly on the bed. Mo Han, who had just returned from the bathroom, was tidying up the bed. Lin Lin suddenly opened her eyes and asked, "What are you doing?"
Mo Han looked around and said, 'Ah, I'm looking for clothes.'
Lin Lin said: "Looking for clothes? They're in the bathroom. You were sick last night, I was exhausted."
Mo Han said, 'Then I'll be going back first.' After saying that, Mo Han turned off the light and left.
Lu Xiao said: "Please connect me to 4321." The operator connected the call, and Lu Xiao said: "Please connect me to 4321 once more."

Lu Xiao, who was on the phone, suddenly stopped, his eyes moistening as he hung up the phone. He looked at the phone receiver in his hand, then at the wall, and finally put the receiver back in its place.

movie101_7176565114756137528_3120_3300.text: Hong Zichen hung up the phone, his face expressionless, and he stared at the wall for a long time.
The next day, Hong Zichen arrived at the police station. He looked at the notice on the door and then walked in.
Hong Zichen walked to the window, leaned against the wall, and looked inside.

Hong Zichen, who was originally leaning against the wall, turned around and walked towards Man. Man, who was standing at the door, saw him and smiled. Hong Zichen looked at him and then at the plaque on the wall.
Hong Zichen said: 'Old Xu, I'm here.'
The others said: "Hong Zichen, come on in."
Man said: 'Friend, we've met before, but I remember, you weren't dressed like this at the time.'
Hong Zichen said: "You've got the wrong person."
Man said: "Hey, friend, don't go, let's have a chat. Friend, friend, friend, don't leave. Hey, friend, friend, watch out, friend, hold up."

Hong Zichen, who had been waiting for a long time, was very excited. He quickly ran to the front of the house, raised his gun, and aimed at Man. Man, who was about to shoot, was startled by the sudden appearance of Hong Zichen.

Man, with a smile, raised his hand to signal Hong Zichen to lower his gun. Hong Zichen, with a puzzled look, lowered his gun. Man, with a smile, raised his gun and pointed it at Hong Zichen's forehead.
Man said: "Pal, if I reveal your identity, you know what fate awaits you."
Hong Zichen said, 'Bro, you and I, we're cut from the same cloth.'
Man asked: "What do you mean?"
Hong Zichen said: "It's all about money in the end. I'm just doing some business with the Communists."
Man smiled and said: "Not bad"

Hong Zichen said, 'Bro, in this war between the Nationalists and Communists, who knows who will win. We profiteers shouldn’t be at odds. What's more, revealing each other's identities benefits neither of us. Let's do this instead: you don't disclose my identity, and I'll give you a sum of money. As for your identity, I'll keep quiet, but you'll need to provide me with information, and I'll pay you extra for it. How about that?'
Hong Zichen looked at Man with a smile, and Man also smiled back.
Man said: "Deal."
Man said: "My friend, from the moment I saw you, I knew we were birds of a feather, lamentably meeting too late."
Hong Zichen said: "Birds of a feather, indeed. So, from now on, let’s meet at the place we agreed on earlier, how's that sound?"
Man said: "No problem"
Hong Zichen said: "Then you go on ahead."

Man said: "See you, see you." Man waved goodbye to Hong Zichen, and Hong Zichen, with a gun in hand, watched Man's retreating figure. He then turned to look at the woman who had just run out of the house.

movie101_7176565114756137528_3300_3480.text: Mo Han ran over and said, 'Che Linlin, how did you get here?'
Che Linlin said, 'I saw you being chased on the road so I hurried over. Are you okay?'
Mo Han said: "I'm fine, just a little misunderstanding with an old friend."
Che Linlin said, "I'm glad you're fine."

Mo Han looked at Che Linlin and said, 'Forget it, let's go home together.' Che Linlin was stunned, and Mo Han left without looking back.
Che Linlin and Mo Han walked out of the house, and Lu Xiao, who was standing on the second floor, saw them and immediately reported to Little Eyed Man.
Mo Han said: "Speak up, who is he? Speak up, and this is yours."

Lu Xiao said: "Of course it's real. Of course. You can choose not to say."
Little Eyed Man said: "No, no, no, I'll talk, I'll talk."
Che Zhen Shan, with a face full of disdain, said: "You're saying Yang Mohan is a communist?"
Mo Han said: "That's what the informant told me directly."
Che Zhen Shan, who was sitting in the chair, was very angry, and he slammed the table and said: "How much did you give him?"
Mo Han said: "A gold bar."
Lu Xiao asked, 'What's happened?'
Che Zhen Shan, with a smile, took a sip of water and said: "Lu Xiao, if Mohan was given a gold bar, she would also say you're a communist, you believe it?"
Che Zhen Shan sighed and said: "I know Che Linlin is with Mohan" "You're not happy in your heart" "But you shouldn't use this way to vent your dissatisfaction."
Mo Han said: "Group leader, I will prove it to you." Mo Han said, then turned and left.
The scene shifts to the courtyard, where a group of people are walking. A man in a suit says, 'Speak.'
Little Eyed Man took the cigarette and said, 'There is a traitor in your organization.'

The next day, Shui Xiu rode her bike to the entrance of the school, looking around for Wu Zheng's figure.
Shui Xiu said: “Director Liu, what did you say”

Director Liu said: "I just contacted the judicial department. They said your concerns about environmental and ecological protection have no direct relation to your husband's injury. These two cases cannot coexist."
Shui Xiu said: "Isn't it the same thing?" "If not for Liu Yuhai's illegal stone factory lacking safety measures" "Then my husband wouldn't have been injured like this"
Director Liu said: "One thing at a time, did the village chief Feng already coordinate with you two?"

Director Liu said: "Being a grassroots cadre is really tough nowadays." "We should also support grassroots work, right?" "How about this, you go back first, we'll discuss it, then give you a response."

movie101_7235213933035192887_1140_1320.text: Bao Liang said: "All my sewage disposal equipment has been inspected."
Zhang Dong said: "If you get involved in any illegal activities, I won't be able to help you."

Zhang Dong said: "Bao Liang"
Bao Liang said: "Oh."
Zhang Dong said: "We are family, and we will be honest with each other."
Bao Liang said: "That's right."
Zhang Dong said: "Although I'm the village chief, there are two committees in this village. I'm the village chief and the old secretary Zhang Tiegui, so not everything is up to me."

Bao Liang said: "Our village is about to have elections. Isn't this a great opportunity? I've heard that the old Party Branch Secretary is getting on in years and might not run again. Who else but you would be the Party branch secretary in this village? Don't worry, I'll campaign for you and ensure you get the position."
Zhang Dong, after thinking for a moment, said: "Ah, Bao Liang."
Zhang Dong said: "Oh."

Zhang Dong said: "Visit those few farmers again, do some work, give some gifts, treat them to a meal, and hand out a red envelope at crucial moments. These things can easily be resolved in the countryside, alright?"
Zhang Dong said: "Alright, alright."
Zhang Dong said: "It's about time for lunch now. Let's go eat."
Bao Liang said: "Alright, I'll listen to you. Let's go eat, Director."
The scene shifts to the village committee, where Liu Mengting and Lin Chunhu are welcoming guests. Liu Mengting greets, "Hello, please come in."
The crowd said, "Let's sit inside."
Someone said: "Mayor Yang, hurry, let's go welcome them."

Zhang Dong, wearing sunglasses, walked towards Mayor Yang and said, "Mayor Yang, long time no see. Mayor Yang, you've come a long way from the town to preside over our village's elections. Thank you."

Mayor Yang said: "The triennial reshuffling of rural Party organizations is a major event in the political life of rural Party members. As the township Party committee, we attach great importance to it."
Zhang Dong said: "Alright, as the village leader, I will actively cooperate."
Zhang Tiegui asked: "Mengting, is everyone here yet?"
Liu Mengting said: "Lin Chunhu hasn't arrived yet. He had an urgent matter at his cooperative but should be on his way now."
Zhang Dong said: "Oh, let's go in first then." The group walked towards the village committee office.
Lin Chunhu said: "Mayor Yang, oh dear, oh dear, Mayor Yang, I apologize for being late due to some matters."
Mayor Yang said: "This is..."
Zhang Tiegui introduced: "This is our village's Deputy Secretary Lin Chunhu."

Zhang Tiegui introduced, "This is the king of turtle farming. He not only makes money from raising turtles but also leads our village to prosperity. We are counting on him for our village's future prosperity."

movie101_7235213933035192887_1320_1500.text: Other: "We will depend on him to lead us to a better life."
The other person said: "Alright, alright, let's start the meeting." "Promising and capable indeed."
The crowd said: "Come, come, please, Chief Yang, please."

Town Mayor said: "Today, I will be presiding over the recommendation work for the Party branch personnel candidates of our Camellia Village, and the candidates will be selected by the Party members and villagers together."

Town Mayor said: "Let's consider who has made the greatest contribution to our village, who can do practical things for our villagers, and we will then nominate the person whom we all deem most suitable."

The scene shifts to the village committee, where the villagers are gathered around the notice board. A man announces: "After an examination by the township Party committee, the following six new candidates for the Party branch are now being announced: Wang Qiuhong, Lin Chunhu, Liu Mengting, Zhang Dong, Zhang Tiegui, Zhang Yibao."
Town Mayor: "The preservation of the ancient architecture here is really impressive."
Old Secretary said: "It's decent enough; this has a history of over three hundred years."
Town Mayor: "It's truly outstanding." "Hey, Old Secretary, you've worked for this village for decades now, haven't you?" "Respected and esteemed indeed."
Town Mayor said: "I heard that there is a strong call for you to serve another term, and some villagers even hope that after you serve another term, you will take on the role of village chief again."
Old Secretary said: "That's because they don't want another village director who holds an office but does nothing."

Town Mayor said: "Is that so? I've also heard some of the villagers' discussions. Zhang Dong, when he ran for village chief three years ago, he was beating his chest, guaranteeing to do a lot of work for the building of our village."

Old Secretary said: "How many of his promised actions have been fulfilled?" "But I'm also to blame." "I'm getting old, and my health is failing." "The slow development of our village these past few years is mainly my responsibility."

Town Mayor said: "Come on, don't say that. You've been the secretary of this village for over twenty years. How can we blame you when your health is not good? You are a meritorious figure for Camellia Village."
Old Secretary said: "Chief Yang, this election is an opportunity, we in Camellia Village can't miss another chance to develop further."
Old Secretary said: "I've been thinking, I do have some experience in work, but when it comes to leading the entire village to prosperity, my abilities are limited."

Old Secretary said: "Moreover, I am getting on in years and my spirit is willing but my flesh is weak. I think that this election should focus on selecting a capable person who can lead the village to prosperity and a better life."
Town Mayor said: "Old Secretary, do you already have someone suitable in mind?" Town Mayor and Old Secretary walked side by side on the road.

movie101_7235213933035192887_1500_1680.text: Lin Chunhu, after thinking for a moment, said: "I, no, no, no, no, the turtle farming cooperative is just getting started, I have a lot of work to do."
Old Secretary said: 'You set up the cooperative to enrich everyone, and you became the secretary for the same reason. Aren't these two tasks essentially the same?'

Lin Chunhu said: "I am young and lack experience. I am afraid I cannot bear this responsibility. If I fail as the secretary, it might hinder the development of the cooperative and cause trouble for the entire village."
Old Secretary said: "You have seen the results of this recommendation; your popularity was the highest."

Old Secretary said: 'This shows that you have earned a lot of respect from everyone. Over the past few years, your turtle farming has led everyone to prosperity, and your capability is evident to all. Everyone chose you, so if you don't become the secretary, should we let Zhang Dong take over?'
Lin Chunhu said: "Our cooperative will introduce a new breed next year, and we will have experts come over to provide guidance. Let's see if anyone has any objections."
Lin Chunhu said: "Alright. I will pick a few representatives from those present to go for training at the agricultural school. Let's see who will sign up first."

The scene shifts to the village committee, where a group of people are gathered around the door, and someone shouts: "Lin Chunhu, Lin Chunhu, it's not good, Baotang and his group have blocked the cooperative's door. Hurry and have a look."
Lin Chunhu said: "Excuse me, excuse me, let's talk it out, let's talk it out, what's the matter?"
Baotang said: "So many turtles have died, what should we do?"
Lin Chunhu said: 'How could this happen? Did you check the cause?'

Baotang said: 'What other reason could there be? We were fine using our own feed before, but as soon as we used yours, there were problems. Look, we've taken loans for tens of thousands, what should we do now?'

Lin Chunhu said: "Quiet, quiet, quiet, quiet, quiet, everyone, please be quiet and listen to me. I will immediately take the feed and the dead turtles for testing. If there is indeed a problem, I will definitely compensate you. I give you my word."

Lin Chunhu said: "Really?" Lin Chunhu took the turtle and placed it on the table. He looked at the turtle in front of him, then slowly reached out to touch it. He stroked the turtle's shell with his fingertips, then gently patted its shell with his palm.
Lin Chunhu took the turtle shell, examined it carefully, and then put it back on the table. He picked up his phone and dialed a number.
Lin Chunhu said: "Hey, Meng Ting, I need your help with something."
Meng Ting said: "Looking at the test report, the feed's indicators all meet the standards. I think the death of the turtles should not be directly related to the feed."
Lin Chunhu said: "That's a relief. But then, what is the real cause?"

movie101_7235213933035192887_1680_1860.text: Liu Mengting said: "I guess, could it be the water quality? Maybe we should go and take a look."
Lin Chunhu said: "Good."

Liu Mengting asked, 'So where did you get the water from?'
Si Fu said: "Due to the lack of rainfall in the past few months, it's water drawn from a nearby creek."
Lin Chunhu said: "Oh, we have also used the water from the creek a few years ago. Didn't seem to find any problems."

The scene shifts to the village committee, where a man is walking down the stairs and says, 'Boss, boss, gosh, Lin Chunhu is gaining a lot of popularity, it's almost catching up with you, boss.'

The man said: 'You're not allowed to take photos.'
The man said: "Oh dear, since you're here, have a seat and have a couple of drinks."

Lin Chunhu said, "Sit, sit, sit, sit."
Liu Mengting said: 'We are here today to discuss an important matter with Mr. Mayor.'

The man said: 'Don’t be so serious, right? When talking about work, we shouldn’t eat, and when eating, we shouldn’t talk about work, right? Come on, drink, drink, drink, drink.'

Lu Chunhu said: "The young lady really can't drink, look, I'll drink for her."

Lu Chunhu and Black Clothes Little Brother drank the liquor in one gulp, Grey Clothes Little Brother said: "Wow, Chunhu can really hold his liquor, another round."
Zhang Dong said: "Alright, alright, Chunhu is family, Chunhu, my brothers are thoughtless, don't take it to heart."

Zhang Dong looked at the two people in front of him, then turned his head to look at the door. At this moment, the door was pushed open, and a man in a suit walked in. Zhang Dong smiled and stood up to greet him.
Zhang Dong said: "You're here about the dead softshell turtles, right?"
Liu Mengting said: "The village chief is indeed a wise man."
Zhang Dong said: "Ah, lately, yes, I've heard some things, how is it, did you find the reason?"
Lu Chunhu said: "We found it, I believe it's due to the sewage discharged from the pig farm upstream at Baoliang."
Zhang Dong said: "Baoliang."
Lu Chunhu said: "Baoliang."

Zhang Dong said: "Chunhu, the location and sewage disposal of his pig farm, have been scientifically validated. It was also approved by the village committees' collective discussion, do you have any other evidence?"

Zhang Dong looked at the report and said: "Where did you get this report from?"
Liu Mengting said: "This, this is tested with the help of our teacher."
Zhang Dong said: "Teacher."

Zhang Dong said: "Teacher, brilliant student, although I am not well-educated, don't understand E. coli or lesser germs, but I know, it's the environmental protection agency that has the final say on environmental testing."

Zhang Dong said: "Chunhu, there's a saying," "you should have heard," "called 'harmony brings wealth'," "we're all villagers," "why make things so stiff?" "Baoliang runs his pig farm," "you raise your turtles," "we're all breeders," "business is hard these days," "it's tough for everyone."

movie101_7235213933035192887_2040_2220.text: Zhang Dong said: "So, can the two of you try to understand each other a bit?"
Chun Hu said: "Yes, that’s why we came today, asking the village head to step in and talk it over with Bao Liang. It solves the problem without creating hard feelings. What do you think?"

Chun Hu said: "I'm not a fool, I know you're not a fool."

Meng Ting asked, 'Do you think the village head will help us solve this?'

Another person said: "Exactly, if he becomes the Secretary, then his family, with brothers in east, west, south, north, and center, will be totally lawless."
Another person said: "If you don’t become the Secretary, our cooperative definitely won’t be able to continue in the future."
Zhang Dong said: "The whole village is counting on you now, Chun Hu, stop refusing it."

The scene shifts to the riverside, where Bao Liang's Son is sitting in the restaurant, and Bao Liang says, 'Don’t talk to me about that Meng Ting, she went to university for a few years and now acts like she doesn’t know her own name.'
Bao Liang's Son said: "Dad, actually, I think what Meng Ting says makes sense. Look, isn't the TV always advocating for river pollution control? How can you still..."

movie101_7235213933035192887_2220_2400.text: The other party said: "You were still raised by me. You're siding with outsiders, eh? Your mother has gone on a trip to Hong Kong. Wait until she comes back to see how she deals with you."
Zhang Xiaobao said: 'Liu Mengting is not an outsider at all. I'm sure my mom will support me when she's back.'
The other said: "I'm warning you. If you dare to marry her into this family, I won't acknowledge you as my son, believe it or not."

Zhang Xiaobao said: "Dad, have some food to calm down." "Actually, I think that Liu Mengting is quite reasonable." "She's also considering the environment of our village." "That would solve the problem."
The other said: "Waste disposal equipment, you say it so lightly." "Do you have any idea how much that costs?" "It's easy for you not to understand how expensive daily necessities can get."

The man said: "Tell me, who gave you the clothes you're wearing? Who provides for your meals? Who gave you that camera to play with? Who gave you the house you live in? Who gave you the car you drive? Isn't it all thanks to that pig?"
Zhang Xiaobao said: 'Ah'
The man said: "No, no, no...ugh, it's all given by me."
Zhang Xiaobao shouted: "Liu Mengting!" "Liu Mengting!" "Liu Mengting!"

Zhang Xiaobao said: "For my sake, please stop making trouble, okay? This pig farm is the main source of income for our family. Besides, every year we also contribute a lot of money to the village, adding a bit to the village's income."

Liu Mengting said: "Can't you think a little more long-term?" "Can't you stop being so selfish?" "Just thinking about these immediate benefits." "Look at the water in our Daxi River," "see what it has become." "This is the water our whole village" "uses to raise turtles with." "What's the use of that little money you contribute?"

Zhang Xiaobao said: "Mengting, I'm really troubled by all this fuss. You see, on one hand there's you, and on the other my father. With you two at odds like this, how are we supposed to live in the future?"
Liu Mengting said: "You and your dad can live however you like. I don't want to marry you and be a pig farmer's wife."
Zhang Xiaobao shouted: "Liu Mengting, Liu Mengting!" Liu Mengting ignored him and walked away. Zhang Xiaobao shouted again: "Liu Mengting!"
Zhang Xi walked to the door and asked, "Uncle Lin, is Uncle Lin home?"
Lin Genxing came out of the house and said, "Oh, Zhang Xi, you're here, come on in, sit for a while."
Lin Genxing said, 'Ah, my dad has gone to play chess with old Wang. What's up, you got something you need from him?'
Zhang Xi said, 'Nothing much. Your dad is an old party member of our village, isn't he? I just came to see him. And this is just a little token of appreciation from me.'
Lin Genxing said: 'Don't mention it, don't mention it.'
Zhang Xi said: "It's not worth much. We have village elections coming up, and we know who's fit to be the village head, don't we?"

movie101_7235213933035192887_2400_2580.text: Zhang Xi said: "We know what's going on, right?"
Zhang Xi said: "Alright, I have some business to attend to, so I'll leave now."
Father of Genxing took out a can of beer from the box and said: "Return this item to the sender."
Lin Genxing said: "This isn't very appropriate. How can we return it after we've opened it?"

Father of Lin Genxing said: "Lin Genxing, you really are a fool. How dare you accept something from their family? Accepting their gift means you owe them a vote. Do you even know what kind of people their family are? As for Zhang Dong, who's the village chief now, since he took office, has he ever done anything for the village? I'm telling you, son, I've lived a long life and I know better. If you want a better future for the village, we need a good leader. I think Chun Hu is a good choice. In tomorrow's election, I'm definitely voting for him."

Lin Genxing said: "You want to vote for him, that’s up to you. Anyway, no one knows who you vote for. Besides, we’ve already accepted the gift. Refusing it would offend them, so we might as well take it."
Father of Genxing said: "Buy an identical one and give it back to them."
Lin Genxing, holding the money, walked out of the house and said, "Only a fool would return it."
The scene shifts to the entrance of the house, where a woman is sweeping the floor. A man comes out of the house, and the woman says, 'Wow, hubby, you’ve done well today. Let me see what you got.'
The other person said: "Of course, the village chief is generous, isn’t he?"
The woman said: "So, according to you, the village chief might be re-elected in this term."

Zhang Baoliang said: "Think about it, we accepted the gift. But in the end, who gets our vote is up to us. It’s a secret ballot; only we know who we voted for. I think Zhang Dong might end up with nothing."
The woman said: "Then who do you think in our village will get elected? Who are you planning to vote for, hubby?"
Lin Genxing said: "I'll vote, but I won't tell you." After saying that, Lin Genxing left, and Zhang Baoliang went back to the kitchen to prepare the dishes.

Zhang Baoliang said, "Son, come quickly, it's time to eat! Today, we have pork trotters, pork stomach, pork ears, and pork intestines—all your favorites! Just smelling and looking at it makes your mouth water. Come quickly!"

movie101_7235213933035192887_2760_2940.text: Zhang Dong walked out of the room, took off his sunglasses, and stood on the stage, looking at the villagers below.

movie101_7235213933035192887_2940_3120.text: Zhang Dong said: "A healthy and happy life, thank you everyone."

movie101_7235213933035192887_3120_3300.text: Lu Chunhu said: "My speech is over, please vote for me."

movie101_7235213933035192887_3300_3480.text: Zhang Xi asked: "How should we deal with this?"

movie101_7235213933035192887_3480_3660.text: The Old Man said: "Yes, Mayor Yang, this is not a bribery election at all. You must investigate him thoroughly and return Lin Chunhu's innocence, okay?"

This method of sewage treatment is itself quite low-carbon and environmentally friendly, plus the investment cost for individual projects is low, it's a purely ecological treatment approach."
